data.actual_result: The popup is cut off from the top making "open in application" button (↗️) change it's position and change flash setting button in camera impossible to click.
data.expected_result: The "add content" popup should adjust itself according to split screen size of Discord app.
data.short_description: Splitting Discord screen to the minimum size cuts off the "add content" popup from the top making some elements unable to click or even see.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server, click on plus button at the bottom left "add content".
